name: PABX_8
description:
My first time going solo and actually completing a game!
I did this one for Mini Game Jam #74, the theme was Chaos and has a restriction I could only use the keys P, A, B, X, Spacebar and 8, hence the name of the game.
The game is pretty straightforward, just press the keys that you see on screen in order to shoot them and dont let them reach you.
There is no sounds, and the art was made by me except for the paint splatters. (The paint splatters are a free photoshop brush: https://www.brusheezy.com/brushes/59244-splatter-brush-collection)
